TopicTitle: Where do I find the option to show more orbits?

Articles.Content: You know in KSP there is an option to show more orbits after encounters with other planets? Well. Is this a thing in consoles and if he’s, where can I find it?

No, it doesn't seem to be in console, along with a lot of other options. It would probably hurt performance.

I manage by creating an extra manuever out into the future where I'm expecting to see the next encounter.

If your path passes through other SOIs, you can add a blank maneuver node somewhere on the last visible leg. You should then be able to see the next couple of patches.

If you are in a stable orbit, you can essentially 'scroll' through your future orbits by advancing with the 'next orbit' button on your blank maneuver node. It's a useful trick, if you're trying to find a 'phasing' rendezvous between ships with intersecting orbits.
